description:
Ajax Hospital Grade Antibacterial Disinfectant is a Multi-Purpose Cleaner for easy grease and stain removal. Instantly cuts through more stains, dirt, grease and grime.

Ajax Hospital Grade Antibacterial Disinfectant Multipurpose cleaner kills 99.9% of germs, including Salmonella, E. coli, Staphylococcus aureus and Enterococcus, all thatâ€™s left is a clean and healthy surface/home.

- Powerful instant degreaser
- Easy grease and stain removal
- Cuts through soap scum
- Grease cutting power
- Our most effective Ajax multipurpose cleaner*
- Leaves behind a shine & a fresh botanical fragrance
- No harsh fumes
- 100% Recyclable Bottle & Trigger (Does not include sleeve)

Our Australian made formula cleans your home/bathroom killing 99.9% of germs and cutting through grease, dirt, soap scum, grime and stains.

Directions for use: Simply spray and wipe.

To Disinfect: thoroughly wet your non-porous surface, wait 10 minutes then wipe clean.

Size: 500mL
Scent: Spring Botanicals

Hard surface disinfectant only. Not to be used on skin. Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. Contains Lactic Acid.

*vs Ajax Spray n' Wipe

HOSPITAL GRADE MULTIPURPOSE CLEANER: Ajax Hospital Grade Antibacterial Disinfectant Multipurpose Cleaner is suitable for multi surfaces

ANTIBACTERIAL CLEANER: Kills 99.9 percent of germs and cuts through grease, grime, stains and soap scum

DISINFECTANT CLEANER: To disinfect surfaces, thoroughly wet your non-porous surface, wait 10 minutes then wipe clean

FRESH SCENT: Leaves behind a shine & fresh Spring Botanicals scent when you spray and wipe

AUSTRALIAN MADE: Proudly made in Australia with a 100 percent recyclable bottle and trigger (does not include sleeve)
name: Ajax Hospital Grade Disinfectant Multipurpose Cleaner 500ml
